channel.title: üèÅ List of Completed FM Games - 2020
channel.description:
# WIP (1/12 months completed)
See also [List of Completed FM Games - 2021](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/list-of-completed-fm-games-2021/87188)
---
This is a list of the completed games for 2020 and sorted by the ending date. [color=steblue]FM games[/color] are in [color=steblue]blue[/color] and [color=orange]Misc games[/color] are in [color=orange]orange[/color]. Emoji are used to indicate the alignments.
:joy_cat: Town :wolf: Scum :monkey_face: Neutral
For additions or corrections, please contact @Whysper (Discord: **Whysper#1313**). Please note that this is currently a work-in-progress and not all games have been added yet.
---
### [color=steblue]Total 2020 FM Games: 4 [ :joy_cat: 2 :white_small_square: 2 :wolf: ][/color] ### [color=orange]Total 2020 Misc Games: 1[/color]
